column4: how do i uninstall a package so that the system has no trace it was ever installed?
can anyone help me? i need to uninstall a package, and leave no trace that it was ever there
apt-get remove, but it isn't known if all traces will be removed. it is not a security program
no luck... cause when i apt-get install the package after apt-get removing it, it dosnt run a setup program like it did the first time
